channel.title: Comments on: Brexit Discourse does not Improve at the BBC.
channel.description: Exegesis Hermeneutics Flux Capacitor of Truthiness

item.title: By: Richard North, Flexit whos side is he on? – RogersLongHairBlog
item.dc:creator: Richard North, Flexit whos side is he on? – RogersLongHairBlog
item.description: […] https://longhairedmusings.wordpress.com/2017/10/27/brexit-discourse-does-not-improve-at-the-bbc/ looking at the comments exchange on this John not possible on BBC anymore that avenue has all but disappeared. https://www.telegraph.co.uk/politics/2019/04/19/last-brexiteers-standing-will-now-do-everything-stop-sell-out/#comments comments are racing ahead on this Telegraph piece about Steve BAker John, I wish more sloggers would stick some links to your blog in there? https://twitter.com/PMotels/status/1119187720444755968 lets try and start a fight with Richard North also we need to get UKIP and Brexit PArty supporters to engage with the same issue IBS and EU Military. All talking head Politiicans silent on it. […]
